description.en: Place five cups onto the challenge field the way you see in the picture. Your task is to throw five ping pong balls into the five cups. One ball per cup.

Stay outside the challenge field.
Do not throw more than one ball into one cup.
Cups cannot be moved.

You managed to fill 1-2 cups in one round = Good job! Are you ready for another try?
You threw the balls into 3-4 cups in one round = Wow! Excellent job!
You managed to fill all the cups during the first round = Outstanding! You are such a pro! Well done!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programing your robot?

Let's count your points!
1-2 cups filled = 5 points
3-4 cups filled = 10 points
5 cups filled = 15 points
We would love to see your results, please share it through our forum page by clicking on the following link:
